snippet: Print advertising revenue fell 19 percent in the third quarter, the company reported, though digital advertising revenue jumped 21 percent....
lead_paragraph: Print advertising revenue fell 19 percent in the third quarter, the company reported, though digital advertising revenue jumped 21 percent.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Reports an Advertising Drop, Though Digital Results Grew
headline.print_headline: Times Co. Reports Drop in Print Ads, but Digital Sales Rise
